definition.text: This node enables the definition of a particular response of the API call.

paragraphs.text: codeName: At the codeName property, the API Fetcher Bot will expect to find the http response code for the API call. You will need to have at least one of these nodes with a codeName = "200" that is the standard code for success.
If you wish to be able to react to other error codes, you should also have more of this nodes with the codeName of each of the status you want to cover.
